name: The Ikea Incident
description:
Escape From a Troll in an Ikea. The Game Gives You 60 Seconds To Prepare...

 Based off of SCP 3008 and most of the models are ripped from Roblox

the game is pretty unoptimized because optimizing Roblox models would take forever so if there happens to be lag, don't be surprised...

WASD to walk

Shift to Run

Space To Jump

Collect all of the Troll Faces
